statements: SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, resource_id, user_id FROM access_control_list WHERE resource_id = 100;
SELECT permission, resource_id FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT id, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 5 AND permission = 'read';
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE permission='read' ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT resource_id) AS num_resources FROM access_control_list GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_resources > 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_permissions FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE resource_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id, permission DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT permission FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 200 OR resource_id = 500 ORDER BY permission ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE permission = 'read';
SELECT user_id, resource_id FROM access_control_list ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT resource_id FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1 AND resource_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE resource_id = 3 ORDER BY permission DESC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'admin' AND user_id > 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE permission IN ('read', 'write') AND user_id < 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS resource_count FROM access_control_list GROUP BY user_id HAVING resource_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list;
SELECT id, resource, user_id FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT permission, resource FROM access_control_list WHERE permission = 'read';
SELECT user_id, permission, resource FROM access_control_list WHERE resource LIKE '%document%';
SELECT user_id, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 2 AND permission = 'write';
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE permission = 'read' ORDER BY resource ASC;
SELECT resource, user_id FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY resource DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id, permission FROM access_control_list INNER JOIN roles ON access_control_list.user_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT resource, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 2002 AND permission = 'write';
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users INNER JOIN roles ON users.user_id = roles.role_id ORDER BY users.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT resource_name, permission_level FROM table1 WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, permission_type FROM table2 ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM table3 WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT permission_id, resource_id FROM table4 WHERE permission_id = 3 ORDER BY resource_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT resource_name, user_id FROM table1 WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT id, role_name, permission_type FROM table2 ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM table3 WHERE user_id = 123 AND role_id = 456;
SELECT permission_id, resource_id FROM table4 WHERE permission_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND resource_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.id;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT id, username FROM users
SELECT role_name FROM roles
SELECT id, permission_name FROM permissions
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles
